name: part_009
file: tmp_≪DREAMCATCHER 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday Celebration 2024! #BaeDay2024 [TQSikoeVXoE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz performs her original song "RXRXR".
Hakos Baelz greets the audience and makes several major announcements regarding her first album and merchandise.
A surprise video message from voice actress Aoi Yuki plays for Hakos Baelz's birthday.

subtitles.original: ...into the night
subtitles.english: ...into the night

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: Ladies and gentlemen!
subtitles.english: Ladies and gentlemen!

subtitles.original: The Baelday is now a rage!
subtitles.english: The Baelday is now a rage!

subtitles.original: 地球はどこなの
subtitles.english: Where is the Earth?

subtitles.original: 僕に価値はあるの
subtitles.english: Do I have any value?

subtitles.original: 現実を壊せば
subtitles.english: If I break reality,

subtitles.original: そこはシャングリラ
subtitles.english: it's a Shangri-la there.

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Rogue Rat Runaway
subtitles.english: Rogue Rat Runaway

subtitles.original: Gotta get out of this place...
subtitles.english: Gotta get out of this place...

subtitles.original: ...止まらない
subtitles.english: ...I can't stop.

subtitles.original: Rogue Rat Runaway
subtitles.english: Rogue Rat Runaway

subtitles.original: 忠誠 逆転 反転 世界
subtitles.english: Loyalty, reversal, inverted world.

subtitles.original: Rogue Rat Runaway
subtitles.english: Rogue Rat Runaway

subtitles.original: Yeah won't you say my name 詰まらない
subtitles.english: Yeah won't you say my name, it's boring.

subtitles.original: Rogue Rat Runaway
subtitles.english: Rogue Rat Runaway

subtitles.original: 本能知っちゃうボーイ 付いて来て
subtitles.english: The boy who knows instinct, follow me.

subtitles.original: 風のように
subtitles.english: Like the wind,

subtitles.original: 霞むように
subtitles.english: like the haze,

subtitles.original: We'll vanish into the night
subtitles.english: We'll vanish into the night

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Did you like it?
subtitles.english: Did you like it?

subtitles.original: I told you there was not going to be any time for breaks.
subtitles.english: I told you there was not going to be any time for breaks.

subtitles.original: It was going to be song after song after song after song!
subtitles.english: It was going to be song after song after song after song!

subtitles.original: I hope you enjoyed it.
subtitles.english: I hope you enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: We had a lot of guest songs,
subtitles.english: We had a lot of guest songs,

subtitles.original: and I'm so happy and honored that I was able to perform with so many members
subtitles.english: and I'm so happy and honored that I was able to perform with so many members

subtitles.original: that I look up to and that have helped me so much on my idol journey.
subtitles.english: that I look up to and that have helped me so much on my idol journey.

subtitles.original: I could cry!
subtitles.english: I could cry!

subtitles.original: But the last thing that you heard was something very special.
subtitles.english: But the last thing that you heard was something very special.

subtitles.original: Did you know... I just came out with a new song!
subtitles.english: Did you know... I just came out with a new song!

subtitles.original: What? That last song was a new song? What?
subtitles.english: What? That last song was a new song? What?

subtitles.original: なんのど！？ オリジナルソング？
subtitles.english: What!? Original song?

subtitles.original: Yes, that's right. The last song I just sang called RXRXR
subtitles.english: Yes, that's right. The last song I just sang called RXRXR

subtitles.original: is my new original,
subtitles.english: is my new original,

subtitles.original: and the music video will be coming out after the stream, so please do check it out.
subtitles.english: and the music video will be coming out after the stream, so please do check it out.

subtitles.original: But that's actually not the major announcement.
subtitles.english: But that's actually not the major announcement.

subtitles.original: Did you think that was the major— no.
subtitles.english: Did you think that was the major— no.

subtitles.original: The actual major announcement is what comes with the song.
subtitles.english: The actual major announcement is what comes with the song.

subtitles.original: Tan-tan-tan-tan! Little Rat has been cooking,
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Little Rat has been cooking,

subtitles.original: and I bring you my first album: ZODIAC!
subtitles.english: and I bring you my first album: ZODIAC!

subtitles.original: My first album is finally out.
subtitles.english: My first album is finally out.

subtitles.original: It consists of 13 brand new songs. 13!
subtitles.english: It consists of 13 brand new songs. 13!

subtitles.original: Not one, not two... 13 brand new songs,
subtitles.english: Not one, not two... 13 brand new songs,

subtitles.original: ZODIAC by yours truly, Hakos Baelz.
subtitles.english: ZODIAC by yours truly, Hakos Baelz.

subtitles.original: I've been working on this for so long, and it has cost me blood, sweat, and tears,
subtitles.english: I've been working on this for so long, and it has cost me blood, sweat, and tears,

subtitles.original: but it's finally out.
subtitles.english: but it's finally out.

subtitles.original: The digital version will be available at midnight at your local time.
subtitles.english: The digital version will be available at midnight at your local time.

subtitles.original: I'll be doing a first listen at midnight JST tonight.
subtitles.english: I'll be doing a first listen at midnight JST tonight.

subtitles.original: So make sure you go and check out that stream, maybe you can come listen to it with me.
subtitles.english: So make sure you go and check out that stream, maybe you can come listen to it with me.

subtitles.original: But for those who like physical... physical, physical, physical CD sets,
subtitles.english: But for those who like physical... physical, physical, physical CD sets,

subtitles.original: yes, there's a physical CD that will be available for purchase after this stream as well.
subtitles.english: yes, there's a physical CD that will be available for purchase after this stream as well.

subtitles.original: And there's also a ZODIAC-themed fan!
subtitles.english: And there's also a ZODIAC-themed fan!

subtitles.original: There's a fan, ご覧よ！
subtitles.english: There's a fan, look!

subtitles.original: カッコよくない？ It's so cool.
subtitles.english: Isn't it cool? It's so cool.

subtitles.original: It's like a— it's an exclusive fan that has the art from the album cover,
subtitles.english: It's like a— it's an exclusive fan that has the art from the album cover,

subtitles.original: and I think it's so cool and you can like use it to decorate your own desk space
subtitles.english: and I think it's so cool and you can like use it to decorate your own desk space

subtitles.original: or whatever you want to put it. I think it's really cool.
subtitles.english: or whatever you want to put it. I think it's really cool.

subtitles.original: So please do support it, I worked really, really hard and I can't believe I can say it.
subtitles.english: So please do support it, I worked really, really hard and I can't believe I can say it.

subtitles.original: My first album, ZODIAC, is now out. Soon. Will be out soon.
subtitles.english: My first album, ZODIAC, is now out. Soon. Will be out soon.

subtitles.original: Yes, but I can announce it!
subtitles.english: Yes, but I can announce it!

subtitles.original: Okay, calm down. If you think that was the end of Shio-taro, no.
subtitles.english: Okay, calm down. If you think that was the end of Shio-taro, no.

subtitles.original: There's more! I bring you...
subtitles.english: There's more! I bring you...

subtitles.original: Tan-tan-tan-tan! Hakos Baelz 2024 Birthday Merch!
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Hakos Baelz 2024 Birthday Merch!

subtitles.original: Because I don't know if you know, it's my birthday!
subtitles.english: Because I don't know if you know, it's my birthday!

subtitles.original: It's my birth— eh?
subtitles.english: It's my birth— eh?

subtitles.original: Wait, what? Wait, wait, wait... eh?
subtitles.english: Wait, what? Wait, wait, wait... eh?

subtitles.original: Staff has told me... what? Eh? Wait...
subtitles.english: Staff has told me... what? Eh? Wait...

subtitles.original: Apparently I have a video message from someone.
subtitles.english: Apparently I have a video message from someone.

subtitles.original: Eh? Wait, seriously? まじ？ Wait...
subtitles.english: Eh? Wait, seriously? Seriously? Wait...

subtitles.original: Hold on, this is not part of the plan. Eh? Okay...
subtitles.english: Hold on, this is not part of the plan. Eh? Okay...

subtitles.original: I don't know who it's from.
subtitles.english: I don't know who it's from.

subtitles.original: 親愛なるハコス・ベールズ殿、
subtitles.english: My dear Fräulein Hakos Baelz,

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう。
subtitles.english: I bid you a happy birthday.

subtitles.original: 新たな年齢を迎えることが、
subtitles.english: I pray that this milestone

subtitles.original: 貴殿の更なる成長と成功につながるよう、
subtitles.english: brings with it even greater growth and success for you.

subtitles.original: 私も心から祈っている。
subtitles.english: I also pray for this from the bottom of my heart.

subtitles.original: きっと素晴らしい1年になることだろう。
subtitles.english: This coming year will surely be a momentous one.

subtitles.original: ああ、もちろん、
subtitles.english: Of course,

subtitles.original: 日々の研鑽は怠らぬように。
subtitles.english: I trust you will not shirk your regular studies.

subtitles.original: ということで、ハコスちゃん、Wassup!
subtitles.english: And so, Hakos-chan, wassup!

subtitles.original: 初めまして、声優の悠木碧です。
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you, I'm voice actress Yuki Aoi.
